verses.verse: שְׁפַר֙ <WH8232> be acceptable קֳדָ֣ם <WH6925> before דָּרְיָ֔וֶשׁ <WH1868> Darius וַהֲקִים֙ <WH6966> to set עַל־ <WH5922> over מַלְכוּתָ֔א <WH4437> the kingdom לַאֲחַשְׁדַּרְפְּנַיָּ֖א <WH324> princes מְאָ֣ה <WH3969> an hundred וְעֶשְׂרִ֑ין <WH6243> and twenty דִּ֥י <WH1768> should לֶהֱוֹ֖ן <WH1934> which should be בְּכָל־ <WH3606> over the whole מַלְכוּתָֽא׃ <WH4437> kingdom

וְעֵ֤לָּא <WH5924> And over מִנְּהוֹן֙ <WH4481> these סָרְכִ֣ין <WH5632> presidents תְּלָתָ֔א <WH8532> three דִּ֥י <WH1768> whom דָנִיֵּ֖אל <WH1841> Daniel חַֽד־ <WH2298> [was] first מִנְּה֑וֹן <WH4481> of whom דִּֽי־ <WH1768> whom לֶהֱוֹ֞ן <WH1934> might אֲחַשְׁדַּרְפְּנַיָּ֣א <WH324> the princes אִלֵּ֗ין <WH459> that יָהֲבִ֤ין <WH3052> give לְהוֹן֙ טַעְמָ֔א <WH2941> accounts וּמַלְכָּ֖א <WH4430> unto them and the king לָֽא־ <WH3809> no לֶהֱוֵ֥א <WH1934> should have נָזִֽק׃ <WH5142> damage

אֱדַ֙יִן֙ <WH116> Then דָּנִיֵּ֣אל <WH1841> Daniel דְּנָ֔ה <WH1836> this הֲוָ֣א <WH1934> was מִתְנַצַּ֔ח <WH5330> preferred עַל־ <WH5922> above סָרְכַיָּ֖א <WH5632> the presidents וַאֲחַשְׁדַּרְפְּנַיָּ֑א <WH324> and princes כָּל־ <WH3606> the whole קֳבֵ֗ל <WH6903> according to דִּ֣י <WH1768> forasmuch ר֤וּחַ <WH7308> spirit יַתִּירָא֙ <WH3493> an excellent בֵּ֔הּ וּמַלְכָּ֣א <WH4430> [was] in him and the king עֲשִׁ֔ית <WH6246> thought לַהֲקָמוּתֵ֖הּ <WH6966> to set עַל־ <WH5922> him over כָּל־ <WH3606> the entire מַלְכוּתָֽא׃ <WH4437> realm

אֱדַ֨יִן <WH116> Then סָֽרְכַיָּ֜א <WH5632> the presidents וַאֲחַשְׁדַּרְפְּנַיָּ֗א <WH324> and princes הֲו֨וֹ <WH1934> began בָעַ֧יִן <WH1156> trying עִלָּ֛ה <WH5931> occasion לְהַשְׁכָּחָ֥ה <WH7912> to find לְדָנִיֵּ֖אל <WH1841> against Daniel מִצַּ֣ד <WH6655> concerning מַלְכוּתָ֑א <WH4437> the kingdom וְכָל־ <WH3606> but עִלָּ֨ה <WH5931> occasion וּשְׁחִיתָ֜ה <WH7844> fault לָא־ <WH3809> none יָכְלִ֣ין <WH3202> they could לְהַשְׁכָּחָ֗ה <WH7912> find כָּל־ <WH3606> was there any קֳבֵל֙ <WH6903> forasmuch דִּֽי־ <WH1768> forasmuch מְהֵימַ֣ן <WH540> as he [was] faithful ה֔וּא <WH1932> it וְכָל־ <WH3606> all שָׁלוּ֙ <WH7960> error וּשְׁחִיתָ֔ה <WH7844> or fault לָ֥א <WH3809> nor הִשְׁתְּכַ֖חַת <WH7912> found עֲלֽוֹהִי׃ <WH5922> in him

אֱ֠דַיִן <WH116> Then גֻּבְרַיָּ֤א <WH1400> men אִלֵּךְ֙ <WH479> these אָֽמְרִ֔ין <WH560> said דִּ֣י <WH1768> forasmuch לָ֧א <WH3809> We shall not נְהַשְׁכַּ֛ח <WH7912> find לְדָנִיֵּ֥אל <WH1841> Daniel דְּנָ֖ה <WH1836> this כָּל־ <WH3606> any עִלָּ֑א <WH5931> occasion לָהֵ֕ן <WH3861> except הַשְׁכַּ֥חְנָֽה <WH7912> we find עֲל֖וֹהִי <WH5922> against בְּדָ֥ת <WH1882> [it] against him concerning the law אֱלָהֵֽהּ׃ <WH426> of his God ס

אֱ֠דַיִן <WH116> Then סָרְכַיָּ֤א <WH5632> presidents וַאֲחַשְׁדַּרְפְּנַיָּא֙ <WH324> and princes אִלֵּ֔ן <WH459> these הַרְגִּ֖שׁוּ <WH7284> assembled together עַל־ <WH5922> unto him מַלְכָּ֑א <WH4430> to the king וְכֵן֙ <WH3652> thus אָמְרִ֣ין <WH560> and said לֵ֔הּ דָּרְיָ֥וֶשׁ <WH1868> Darius מַלְכָּ֖א <WH4430> King לְעָלְמִ֥ין <WH5957> for ever חֱיִֽי׃ <WH2418> live

אִתְיָעַ֜טוּ <WH3272> have consulted together כֹּ֣ל ׀ <WH3606> All סָרְכֵ֣י <WH5632> the presidents מַלְכוּתָ֗א <WH4437> of the kingdom סִגְנַיָּ֤א <WH5460> the governors וַֽאֲחַשְׁדַּרְפְּנַיָּא֙ <WH324> and the princes הַדָּֽבְרַיָּ֣א <WH1907> the counsellors וּפַחֲוָתָ֔א <WH6347> and the captains לְקַיָּמָ֤ה <WH6966> to establish קְיָם֙ <WH7010> statute מַלְכָּ֔א <WH4430> a royal וּלְתַקָּפָ֖ה <WH8631> and to make a firm אֱסָ֑ר <WH633> decree דִּ֣י <WH1768> who כָל־ <WH3606> any דִּֽי־ <WH1768> who יִבְעֵ֣ה <WH1156> that whosoever shall ask בָ֠עוּ <WH1159> a petition מִן־ <WH4481> of כָּל־ <WH3606> to any אֱלָ֨הּ <WH426> God וֶֽאֱנָ֜שׁ <WH606> or man עַד־ <WH5705> for יוֹמִ֣ין <WH3118> days תְּלָתִ֗ין <WH8533> thirty לָהֵן֙ <WH3861> save מִנָּ֣ךְ <WH4481> of thee מַלְכָּ֔א <WH4430> O king יִתְרְמֵ֕א <WH7412> he shall be cast לְגֹ֖ב <WH1358> into the den אַרְיָוָתָֽא׃ <WH744> of lions

כְּעַ֣ן <WH3705> Now מַלְכָּ֔א <WH4430> O king תְּקִ֥ים <WH6966> establish אֱסָרָ֖א <WH633> the decree וְתִרְשֻׁ֣ם <WH7560> and sign כְּתָבָ֑א <WH3792> the writing דִּ֣י <WH1768> so לָ֧א <WH3809> that it be not לְהַשְׁנָיָ֛ה <WH8133> changed כְּדָת־ <WH1882> according to the law מָדַ֥י <WH4076> of the Medes וּפָרַ֖ס <WH6540> and Persians דִּי־ <WH1768> which לָ֥א <WH3809> not תֶעְדֵּֽא׃ <WH5709> which altereth

כָּל־ <WH3606> all קֳבֵ֖ל <WH6903> according to דְּנָ֑ה <WH1836> time מַלְכָּא֙ <WH4430> king דָּֽרְיָ֔וֶשׁ <WH1868> Darius רְשַׁ֥ם <WH7560> signed כְּתָבָ֖א <WH3792> the writing וֶאֱסָרָֽא׃ <WH633> and the decree

וְ֠דָנִיֵּאל <WH1841> Now when Daniel כְּדִ֨י <WH1768> now when יְדַ֜ע <WH3046> knew דִּֽי־ <WH1768> now when רְשִׁ֤ים <WH7560> was signed כְּתָבָא֙ <WH3792> that the writing עַ֣ל <WH5954> he went לְבַיְתֵ֔הּ <WH1005> into his house וְכַוִּ֨ין <WH3551> and his windows פְּתִיחָ֥ן <WH6606> being open לֵהּ֙ בְּעִלִּיתֵ֔הּ <WH5952> in his chamber נֶ֖גֶד <WH5049> toward יְרוּשְׁלֶ֑ם <WH3390> Jerusalem וְזִמְנִין֩ <WH2166> times תְּלָתָ֨ה <WH8532> three בְיוֹמָ֜א <WH3118> a day ה֣וּא ׀ <WH1932> he בָּרֵ֣ךְ <WH1289> he kneeled עַל־ <WH5922> upon בִּרְכ֗וֹהִי <WH1291> his knees וּמְצַלֵּ֤א <WH6739> and prayed וּמוֹדֵא֙ <WH3029> and gave thanks קֳדָ֣ם <WH6925> before אֱלָהֵ֔הּ <WH426> his God כָּל־ <WH3606> all קֳבֵל֙ <WH6903> according to דִּֽי־ <WH1768> now when הֲוָ֣א <WH1934> he עָבֵ֔ד <WH5648> had been doing מִן־ <WH4481> according קַדְמַ֖ת <WH6928> previously דְּנָֽה׃ <WH1836> time ס

אֱ֠דַיִן <WH116> Then גֻּבְרַיָּ֤א <WH1400> men אִלֵּךְ֙ <WH479> these הַרְגִּ֔שׁוּ <WH7284> assembled וְהַשְׁכַּ֖חוּ <WH7912> and found לְדָנִיֵּ֑אל <WH1841> Daniel בָּעֵ֥א <WH1156> praying וּמִתְחַנַּ֖ן <WH2604> and making supplication קֳדָ֥ם <WH6925> before אֱלָהֵֽהּ׃ <WH426> his God

בֵּ֠אדַיִן <WH116> Then קְרִ֨יבוּ <WH7127> they came near וְאָמְרִ֥ין <WH560> and spake קֳדָם־ <WH6925> before מַלְכָּא֮ <WH4430> the king עַל־ <WH5922> concerning אֱסָ֣ר <WH633> decree מַלְכָּא֒ <WH4430> the king's הֲלָ֧א <WH3809> Hast thou not אֱסָ֣ר <WH633> a decree רְשַׁ֗מְתָּ <WH7560> signed דִּ֣י <WH1768> who כָל־ <WH3606> that every אֱנָ֡שׁ <WH606> man דִּֽי־ <WH1768> which יִבְעֵה֩ <WH1156> that shall ask מִן־ <WH4481> [a petition] of כָּל־ <WH3606> any אֱלָ֨הּ <WH426> God וֶֽאֱנָ֜שׁ <WH606> or man עַד־ <WH5705> within יוֹמִ֣ין <WH3118> days תְּלָתִ֗ין <WH8533> thirty לָהֵן֙ <WH3861> save מִנָּ֣ךְ <WH4481> of thee מַלְכָּ֔א <WH4430> O king יִתְרְמֵ֕א <WH7412> shall be cast לְג֖וֹב <WH1358> into the den אַרְיָותָ֑א <WH744> the lions' עָנֵ֨ה <WH6032> answered מַלְכָּ֜א <WH4430> king וְאָמַ֗ר <WH560> and said יַצִּיבָ֧א <WH3330> [is] true מִלְּתָ֛א <WH4406> The thing כְּדָת־ <WH1882> according to the law מָדַ֥י <WH4076> of the Medes וּפָרַ֖ס <WH6540> and Persians דִּי־ <WH1768> who לָ֥א <WH3809> not תֶעְדֵּֽא׃ <WH5709> which altereth

בֵּ֠אדַיִן <WH116> Then עֲנ֣וֹ <WH6032> answered וְאָמְרִין֮ <WH560> they and said קֳדָ֣ם <WH6925> before מַלְכָּא֒ <WH4430> the king דִּ֣י <WH1768> who דָנִיֵּ֡אל <WH1841> That Daniel דִּי֩ <WH1768> which מִן־ <WH4481> which [is] of בְּנֵ֨י <WH1123> the children גָלוּתָ֜א <WH1547> of the captivity דִּ֣י <WH1768> who יְה֗וּד <WH3061> of Judah לָא־ <WH3809> not שָׂ֨ם <WH7761> pays [עֲלַיִךְ כ] (עֲלָ֤ךְ <WH5921> and ק) מַלְכָּא֙ <WH4430> O king טְעֵ֔ם <WH2942> chancellor וְעַל־ <WH5922> thee אֱסָרָ֖א <WH633> nor the decree דִּ֣י <WH1768> who רְשַׁ֑מְתָּ <WH7560> that thou hast signed וְזִמְנִ֤ין <WH2166> times תְּלָתָה֙ <WH8532> three בְּיוֹמָ֔א <WH3118> a day בָּעֵ֖א <WH1156> but maketh בָּעוּתֵֽהּ׃ <WH1159> his petition

אֱדַ֨יִן <WH116> Then מַלְכָּ֜א <WH4430> the king כְּדִ֧י <WH1768> soon מִלְּתָ֣א <WH4406> [these] words שְׁמַ֗ע <WH8086> when he heard שַׂגִּיא֙ <WH7690> was sore בְּאֵ֣שׁ <WH888> displeased עֲל֔וֹהִי <WH5922> on וְעַ֧ל <WH5922> about דָּנִיֵּ֛אל <WH1841> Daniel שָׂ֥ם <WH7761> with himself and set בָּ֖ל <WH1079> [his] heart לְשֵׁיזָבוּתֵ֑הּ <WH7804> to deliver וְעַד֙ <WH5705> till מֶֽעָלֵ֣י <WH4606> the going down שִׁמְשָׁ֔א <WH8122> of the sun הֲוָ֥א <WH1934> kept מִשְׁתַּדַּ֖ר <WH7712> exerting לְהַצָּלוּתֵֽהּ׃ <WH5338> to deliver

בֵּאדַ֙יִן֙ <WH116> Then גֻּבְרַיָּ֣א <WH1400> men אִלֵּ֔ךְ <WH479> these הַרְגִּ֖שׁוּ <WH7284> assembled עַל־ <WH5922> unto מַלְכָּ֑א <WH4430> the king וְאָמְרִ֣ין <WH560> and said לְמַלְכָּ֗א <WH4430> unto the king דַּ֤ע <WH3046> Know מַלְכָּא֙ <WH4430> O king דִּֽי־ <WH1768> which דָת֙ <WH1882> that the law לְמָדַ֣י <WH4076> of the Medes וּפָרַ֔ס <WH6540> and Persians דִּֽי־ <WH1768> which כָל־ <WH3606> [is] That no אֱסָ֥ר <WH633> decree וּקְיָ֛ם <WH7010> nor statute דִּֽי־ <WH1768> which מַלְכָּ֥א <WH4430> which the king יְהָקֵ֖ים <WH6966> establisheth לָ֥א <WH3809> or even לְהַשְׁנָיָֽה׃ <WH8133> may be changed

בֵּאדַ֜יִן <WH116> Then מַלְכָּ֣א <WH4430> the king אֲמַ֗ר <WH560> commanded וְהַיְתִיו֙ <WH858> and they brought לְדָ֣נִיֵּ֔אל <WH1841> Daniel וּרְמ֕וֹ <WH7412> and cast לְגֻבָּ֖א <WH1358> [him] into the den דִּ֣י <WH1768> whom אַרְיָוָתָ֑א <WH744> of lions עָנֵ֤ה <WH6032> spake מַלְכָּא֙ <WH4430> [Now] the king וְאָמַ֣ר <WH560> and said לְדָנִיֵּ֔אל <WH1841> unto Daniel אֱלָהָ֗ךְ <WH426> Thy God דִּ֣י <WH1768> whom [אַנְתָּה כ] (אַ֤נְתְּ <WH607> as for thee ק) פָּֽלַֽח־ <WH6399> servest לֵהּ֙ בִּתְדִירָ֔א <WH8411> continually ה֖וּא <WH1932> will Himself יְשֵׁיזְבִנָּֽךְ׃ <WH7804> he will deliver

וְהֵיתָ֙יִת֙ <WH858> was brought אֶ֣בֶן <WH69> stone חֲדָ֔ה <WH2298> And a וְשֻׂמַ֖ת <WH7761> and laid עַל־ <WH5922> upon פֻּ֣ם <WH6433> the mouth גֻּבָּ֑א <WH1358> of the den וְחַתְמַ֨הּ <WH2857> sealed מַלְכָּ֜א <WH4430> and the king בְּעִזְקְתֵ֗הּ <WH5824> it with his own signet וּבְעִזְקָת֙ <WH5824> and with the signet רַבְרְבָנ֔וֹהִי <WH7261> of his lords דִּ֛י <WH1768> so לָא־ <WH3809> might not תִשְׁנֵ֥א <WH8133> be changed צְב֖וּ <WH6640> that the purpose בְּדָנִיֵּֽאל׃ <WH1841> concerning Daniel

אֱ֠דַיִן <WH116> Then אֲזַ֨ל <WH236> went מַלְכָּ֤א <WH4430> the king לְהֵֽיכְלֵהּ֙ <WH1965> to his palace וּבָ֣ת <WH956> and passed the night טְוָ֔ת <WH2908> fasting וְדַחֲוָ֖ן <WH1761> were instruments לָא־ <WH3809> neither הַנְעֵ֣ל <WH5954> of musick brought קָֽדָמ֑וֹהִי <WH6925> before וְשִׁנְתֵּ֖הּ <WH8139> him and his sleep נַדַּ֥ת <WH5075> went עֲלֽוֹהִי׃ <WH5922> from him

בֵּאדַ֣יִן <WH116> Then מַלְכָּ֔א <WH4430> the king בִּשְׁפַּרְפָּרָ֖א <WH8238> very early יְק֣וּם <WH6966> arose בְּנָגְהָ֑א <WH5053> in the morning וּבְהִ֨תְבְּהָלָ֔ה <WH927> in haste לְגֻבָּ֥א <WH1358> unto the den דִֽי־ <WH1768> forasmuch אַרְיָוָתָ֖א <WH744> of lions אֲזַֽל׃ <WH236> and went

וּכְמִקְרְבֵ֣הּ <WH7127> And when he came לְגֻבָּ֔א <WH1358> to the den לְדָ֣נִיֵּ֔אל <WH1841> unto Daniel בְּקָ֥ל <WH7032> voice עֲצִ֖יב <WH6088> with a lamentable זְעִ֑ק <WH2200> he cried עָנֵ֨ה <WH6032> spake מַלְכָּ֜א <WH4430> [and] the king וְאָמַ֣ר <WH560> and said לְדָנִיֵּ֗אל <WH1841> to Daniel דָּֽנִיֵּאל֙ <WH1841> O Daniel עֲבֵד֙ <WH5649> servant אֱלָהָ֣א <WH426> God חַיָּ֔א <WH2417> of the living אֱלָהָ֗ךְ <WH426> is thy God דִּ֣י <WH1768> whom [אַנְתָּה כ] (אַ֤נְתְּ <WH607> whom ק) פָּֽלַֽח־ <WH6399> whom thou servest לֵהּ֙ בִּתְדִירָ֔א <WH8411> continually הַיְכִ֥ל <WH3202> able לְשֵׁיזָבוּתָ֖ךְ <WH7804> to deliver מִן־ <WH4481> thee from אַרְיָוָתָֽא׃ <WH744> lion
אֱדַ֙יִן֙ <WH116> Then דָּנִיֶּ֔אל <WH1841> Daniel עִם־ <WH5974> unto מַלְכָּ֖א <WH4430> the king מַלִּ֑ל <WH4449> said מַלְכָּ֖א <WH4430> O king לְעָלְמִ֥ין <WH5957> for ever חֱיִֽי׃ <WH2418> live

אֱלָהִ֞י <WH426> My God שְׁלַ֣ח <WH7972> hath sent מַלְאֲכֵ֗הּ <WH4398> his angel וּֽסֲגַ֛ר <WH5463> and hath shut פֻּ֥ם <WH6433> mouths אַרְיָוָתָ֖א <WH744> the lions' וְלָ֣א <WH3809> that they have not חַבְּל֑וּנִי <WH2255> hurt כָּל־ <WH3606> all קֳבֵ֗ל <WH6903> according to דִּ֤י <WH1768> forasmuch קָֽדָמ֙וֹהִי֙ <WH6925> before זָכוּ֙ <WH2136> him innocency הִשְׁתְּכַ֣חַת <WH7912> was found לִ֔י וְאַ֤ף <WH638> in me and also [קָדָמַיִךְ כ] (קָֽדָמָךְ֙ <WH6925> before ק) מַלְכָּ֔א <WH4430> thee O king חֲבוּלָ֖ה <WH2248> hurt לָ֥א <WH3809> no עַבְדֵֽת׃ <WH5648> have I done

בֵּאדַ֣יִן <WH116> Then מַלְכָּ֗א <WH4430> was the king שַׂגִּיא֙ <WH7690> exceeding טְאֵ֣ב <WH2868> glad עֲל֔וֹהִי <WH5922> for him וּלְדָ֣נִיֵּ֔אל <WH1841> Daniel אֲמַ֖ר <WH560> and commanded לְהַנְסָקָ֣ה <WH5267> up מִן־ <WH4481> out of גֻּבָּ֑א <WH1358> the den וְהֻסַּ֨ק <WH5267> was taken up דָּנִיֵּ֜אל <WH1841> So Daniel מִן־ <WH4481> out of גֻּבָּ֗א <WH1358> the den וְכָל־ <WH3606> manner חֲבָל֙ <WH2257> of hurt לָא־ <WH3809> and no הִשְׁתְּכַ֣ח <WH7912> was found בֵּ֔הּ דִּ֖י <WH1768> because הֵימִ֥ן <WH540> upon him because he believed בֵּאלָהֵֽהּ׃ <WH426> in his God

וַאֲמַ֣ר <WH560> commanded מַלְכָּ֗א <WH4430> And the king וְהַיְתִ֞יו <WH858> and they brought גֻּבְרַיָּ֤א <WH1400> men אִלֵּךְ֙ <WH479> those דִּֽי־ <WH1768> who אֲכַ֤לוּ <WH399> accuse קַרְצ֙וֹהִי֙ <WH7170> accuse דִּ֣י <WH1768> who דָֽנִיֵּ֔אל <WH1841> Daniel וּלְגֹ֤ב <WH1358> [them] into the den אַרְיָוָתָא֙ <WH744> of lions רְמ֔וֹ <WH7412> and they cast אִנּ֖וּן <WH581> them בְּנֵיה֣וֹן <WH1123> their children וּנְשֵׁיה֑וֹן <WH5389> and their wives וְלָֽא־ <WH3809> or ever מְט֞וֹ <WH4291> they came לְאַרְעִ֣ית <WH773> at the bottom גֻּבָּ֗א <WH1358> of the den עַ֠ד <WH5705> until דִּֽי־ <WH1768> who שְׁלִ֤טֽוּ <WH7981> overpowered בְהוֹן֙ אַרְיָ֣וָתָ֔א <WH744> and the lions וְכָל־ <WH3606> all גַּרְמֵיה֖וֹן <WH1635> their bones הַדִּֽקוּ׃ <WH1855> in pieces

בֵּאדַ֜יִן <WH116> Then דָּרְיָ֣וֶשׁ <WH1868> Darius מַלְכָּ֗א <WH4430> king כְּ֠תַב <WH3790> wrote לְֽכָל־ <WH3606> unto all עַֽמְמַיָּ֞א <WH5972> people אֻמַיָּ֧א <WH524> nations וְלִשָּׁנַיָּ֛א <WH3961> and languages דִּֽי־ <WH1768> who [דָאֲרִין כ] (דָיְרִ֥ין <WH1753> dwell ק) בְּכָל־ <WH3606> in all אַרְעָ֖א <WH772> the earth שְׁלָמְכ֥וֹן <WH8001> Peace יִשְׂגֵּֽא׃ <WH7680> be multiplied

מִן־ <WH4481> according קֳדָמַי֮ <WH6925> before שִׂ֣ים <WH7761> make טְעֵם֒ <WH2942> a decree דִּ֣י ׀ <WH1768> which בְּכָל־ <WH3606> That in every שָׁלְטָ֣ן <WH7985> dominion מַלְכוּתִ֗י <WH4437> of my kingdom לֶהֱוֹ֤ן <WH1934> become [זָאֲעִין כ] (זָיְעִין֙ <WH2112> tremble ק) וְדָ֣חֲלִ֔ין <WH1763> and fear מִן־ <WH4481> according קֳדָ֖ם <WH6925> before אֱלָהֵ֣הּ <WH426> the God דִּי־ <WH1768> which דָֽנִיֵּ֑אל <WH1841> of Daniel דִּי־ <WH1768> which ה֣וּא ׀ <WH1932> it אֱלָהָ֣א <WH426> God חַיָּ֗א <WH2417> for he [is] the living וְקַיָּם֙ <WH7011> and stedfast לְעָ֣לְמִ֔ין <WH5957> for ever וּמַלְכוּתֵהּ֙ <WH4437> and his kingdom דִּֽי־ <WH1768> which לָ֣א <WH3809> [that] which shall not תִתְחַבַּ֔ל <WH2255> be destroyed וְשָׁלְטָנֵ֖הּ <WH7985> and his dominion עַד־ <WH5705> [shall be even] unto סוֹפָֽא׃ <WH5491> the end

מְשֵׁיזִ֣ב <WH7804> He delivereth וּמַצִּ֗ל <WH5338> and rescueth וְעָבֵד֙ <WH5648> and he worketh אָתִ֣ין <WH852> signs וְתִמְהִ֔ין <WH8540> and wonders בִּשְׁמַיָּ֖א <WH8065> in heaven וּבְאַרְעָ֑א <WH772> and in earth דִּ֚י <WH1768> Who שֵׁיזִ֣יב <WH7804> who hath delivered לְדָֽנִיֵּ֔אל <WH1841> Daniel מִן־ <WH4481> from יַ֖ד <WH3028> the power אַרְיָוָתָֽא׃ <WH744> of the lions

וְדָנִיֵּ֣אל <WH1841> Daniel דְּנָ֔ה <WH1836> So this הַצְלַ֖ח <WH6744> prospered בְּמַלְכ֣וּת <WH4437> in the reign דָּרְיָ֑וֶשׁ <WH1868> of Darius וּבְמַלְכ֖וּת <WH4437> and in the reign כּ֥וֹרֶשׁ <WH3567> of Cyrus [פָּרְסָיָא כ] (פָּרְסָאָֽה׃ <WH6543> Persian ק) פ
